snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist 2 - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
A trailer showcasing Thunderful's SteamWorld Heist 2 and the other SteamWorld games, as featured in the Convergence Showcase. 

Get them all on sale as part of the SteamWorld Complete Bundle until 3rd Oct 2024: https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/5141/SteamWorld_Complete_Bundle/
